actor_awards.notes: A legendary comedian known for his timing and 'miser' persona. He has three Stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame (Film, Radio, and TV).

filmography.title: To Be or Not to Be
filmography.role_description: A vain Polish actor who becomes entangled in a dangerous spy plot against the Nazis while dealing with his wife's admirer.
filmography.plot: A troupe of actors in Nazi-occupied Warsaw uses their acting skills to fool the occupying troops and protect the resistance.

filmography.title: The Horn Blows at Midnight
filmography.role_description: An angel sent to Earth to blow the trumpet signaling the end of the world, but he gets distracted.
filmography.plot: An angel is sent to Earth to destroy it with a trumpet blast at midnight but falls for a beautiful woman and encounters fallen angels.

filmography.title: Charley's Aunt
filmography.role_description: An Oxford student who is coerced into dressing up as a wealthy aunt from Brazil to chaperone his friends' dates.
filmography.plot: A college student poses as his friend's rich aunt to help his buddies woo two lovely young women.

filmography.title: George Washington Slept Here
filmography.role_description: A city dweller who is forced by his antique-loving wife to buy and renovate a dilapidated farmhouse.
filmography.plot: A couple buys a run-down farmhouse in Pennsylvania because George Washington supposedly slept there, leading to numerous headaches.

filmography.title: The Hollywood Revue of 1929
filmography.role_description: The Master of Ceremonies for a star-studded musical revue featuring MGM's top talent.
filmography.plot: An all-star musical variety show featuring singing, dancing, and comedy sketches from MGM's contract players.

filmography.title: Broadway Melody of 1936
filmography.role_description: A snooping newspaper columnist who tries to manufacture a scandal involving a producer.
filmography.plot: A Broadway producer is manipulated by a gossip columnist and his former high school sweetheart who wants to be a star.

filmography.title: The Meanest Man in the World
filmography.role_description: A kind-hearted lawyer who decides to adopt a mean persona to become successful.
filmography.plot: A struggling lawyer takes advice to be ruthless to get ahead, but his true nature makes it difficult.

filmography.title: Buck Benny Rides Again
filmography.role_description: A radio star who travels to the West to prove to his girlfriend that he is a real cowboy.
filmography.plot: Jack Benny heads out west with his radio gang to convince everyone he's a tough cowboy.

filmography.title: Love Thy Neighbor
filmography.role_description: He plays a version of himself, continuing his famous radio feud with comedian Fred Allen.
filmography.plot: Radio rivals Jack Benny and Fred Allen take their feud to the big screen with musical numbers and comedy skits.

filmography.title: Man About Town
filmography.role_description: A theatrical producer who tries to make his wife jealous to gain her attention.
filmography.plot: A producer tries to spark his wife's jealousy by pretending to have affairs with showgirls.

filmography.title: Artists and Models
filmography.role_description: An advertising man who needs to find the perfect model for a silverware campaign.
filmography.plot: The head of an ad agency promises a client the perfect 'Snooty Society' model but ends up with a professional model instead.

filmography.title: The Big Broadcast of 1937
filmography.role_description: A radio station manager trying to keep his station afloat amidst various complications.
filmography.plot: A radio station host brings a sponsor's show to the airwaves despite interference from a jealous rival.

filmography.title: College Holiday
filmography.role_description: A hotel partner who gets involved in a scheme to bring students to a resort for a eugenics experiment.
filmography.plot: A hotel owner invites female students to his resort for a 'genetic experiment' while trying to save his business.

filmography.title: It's in the Air
filmography.role_description: A con artist and gambler who tries to evade an IRS agent.
filmography.plot: A confidence man tries to stay one step ahead of the law while maintaining his relationship with his wife.

filmography.title: Transatlantic Merry-Go-Round
filmography.role_description: The master of ceremonies on a cruise ship who gets involved in a murder mystery.
filmography.plot: A variety of characters, including thieves and performers, cross paths on an ocean liner where a murder occurs.

filmography.title: Artists and Models Abroad
filmography.role_description: The leader of an amateur theatrical troupe stranded in Paris.
filmography.plot: An American troupe stranded in Paris tries to get back home by crashing a fashion show.

filmography.title: Chasing Rainbows
filmography.role_description: The stage manager for a traveling musical troupe who deals with the show's troubles.
filmography.plot: A traveling musical troupe faces romantic entanglements and professional challenges on the road.

filmography.title: The Medicine Man
filmography.role_description: A smooth-talking medicine show barker who falls for a local girl.
filmography.plot: A traveling medicine man sets up shop in a small town and faces trouble from the locals.

filmography.title: Lord Byron of Broadway
filmography.role_description: A reporter and friend of the main character, a songwriter.
filmography.plot: A songwriter uses his numerous love affairs as inspiration for his music.

filmography.title: Hollywood Canteen
filmography.role_description: He appears as himself, playing the violin and entertaining troops with other stars.
filmography.plot: Two soldiers on leave in Hollywood spend three nights at the Hollywood Canteen, where they meet many stars.

filmography.title: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as a driver who offers help to the characters in the desert.
filmography.plot: A group of strangers race across California to find a buried fortune of stolen money.

filmography.title: A Guide for the Married Man
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as a 'Technical Adviser' in this comedy about infidelity.
filmography.plot: A husband gets lessons from his friend on how to cheat on his wife without getting caught.

filmography.title: It's in the Bag!
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as himself in this Fred Allen comedy.
filmography.plot: A flea circus operator inherits a fortune but has to find the money, which is hidden in one of five chairs.

filmography.title: Without Reservations
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as himself.
filmography.plot: An author travels to Hollywood to oversee the casting of her book's adaptation and meets a Marine who is perfect for the role.

filmography.title: Somebody Loves Me
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as a newspaper reader.
filmography.plot: The biography of vaudeville star Blossom Seeley and her romance with Benny Fields.
